DataElement.preferredName: Notification Administration Performed Study Activity Reason Code ISO21090.DSET.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed action within the context of a given study that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. A coded value specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of an activity. EXAMPLE(S): routine requirement, drug reaction, infectious disease reporting requirement, on patient request.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Notification Administration Performed Study Activity Reason Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.
